original_title: Premiata Forneria Marconi - Prog Exhibition Live
overview: Featuring Ian Anderson from Jethro Tull. Recorded live in November 2010 at Teatro Tendastrisce, Rome, Italy at Prog Exhibition.  Franz Di Cioccio / vocals, drums, percussion  Franco Mussida / electric and acoustic guitars, vocals, backing vocals  Patrick Djivas / bass  Special guest Ian Anderson / flute, vocals  01:09 La luna nuova Setlist:  08:46 Il banchetto  13:51 Harlequin  21:31 La terra dell'acqua  27:27 Intro Bach  29:58 Bourée - with Ian Anderson  36:15 My God - with Ian Anderson  45:30 Out Of The Roundabout  56:57 Maestro della voce  04:25 Cyber alpha 3.1  09:37 Impressioni di settembre  14:58 La carrozza di Hans - with Ian Anderson  23:10 É festa / Se le brescion / La tentazione
title: Premiata Forneria Marconi - Prog Exhibition Live
